122a7('dul ba): pa gsol bar ma byed cig/bdag cag gis lhung bzed dang /chos goso dang /dra ba dang /phor bu dang /ska rags dang /dran par bya ba dang /dri bar bya ba dang /rtsa ba'i sman dang //
122b1('dul ba): sdong po'i sman dang /lo ma'i sman dang /me tog gi sman dang /'bras bu'i sman dus su rung ba dang /thun tshod du rung ba dang /zhag bdun du rung ba dang /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rung ba rnams
122b2('dul ba): dang /ci dang cis brel pa de dang des mi brel bar bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes zer ba de la bsgo ba mdzad do//bcu gnyis sde 'di dag la gsol pa dang /bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba
122b3('dul ba): mdzad pa la gang dag bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/'di ni las brjod pa dang po'o//gnyis pa la yang don de nyid brjod/
122b4('dul ba): par bya ste/'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdag la gsan du gsol/bcu gnyis sde 'dri dag dge slong 'thab mo bgyid pa/chang 'dru bar bgyid pa/'byed par
122b5('dul ba): bgyid pa/rtsod par bgyid pa/'thab krol bgyid pa/dge slong ma rnams dang shin tu 'dre bas lhan cig gnas par gyur pa/dge slong rnams kyis gnas na dbyung ba'i las
122b6('dul ba): bgyid pa/dge slong ma rnams kyis kyang phyag bya ba'i 'os ma lags pa'i sdom pa bsgo ba/skra 'greng bar gyur/spu langs par gyur pa las/dge 'dun la spu snyol bar
122b7('dul ba): 'tshal/'byung bar skyod par bgyid/'thun par bgyid pa ston par bgyid/mtshams kyi nang du mchis kyi te/bzod pa gsol bar 'tshal bzhin du de'i gan du song ste//
123a1('dul ba): 'di skad ces 'phags pa khyod dge 'dun la spu stsol bar ma byed cig/'byung bar ma spyod cig/'thun par byed pa ma ston cig/mtshams kyi nang du
123a2('dul ba): 'dug ste bzod pa gsol bar ma byed cig/bdag cag gis khyod la lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang /dra ba dang /phor bu dang /skar gos dang /dran par bya ba dang /dri bar bya ba dang //
123a3('dul ba): rtsa ba'i sman dang /sdong bu'i sman dang /lo ma'i sman dang /me tog gi sman dang /'bras bu'i sran dus su rung ba dang /thun tshod du rung ba dang /zhag bdun du rung ba dang /ji srid 'tsho
123a4('dul ba): ber du rung ba rnams dang /ci dang cis brel pa de dang des ma brel bar bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes smra ba'i dge slong ma de dag la/dge slong ma mang pos bzhams te bsgo la/dge slong ma mang pos de
123a5('dul ba): dag la bzhams te bsgo yang /gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu 'dzin cing /mngon par zhen nas 'di ni bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rje su tha snyad 'dogs te/de'i slad du
123a6('dul ba): dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams la gsol ba dang /bzhi'i lus kyis bsgo ba mdzad do//tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde 'di dag la gsol ba
123a7('dul ba): dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsus shig/gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/'di ni las brjod pa gnyis pa'o//gsum pa
123b1('dul ba): la yang las de nyid brjod par bya ste/'phags ma'i dge 'dun phu nu mo dag bdug la gsan du gsol/bcu gnyis sde 'di dag dge slong 'thab mo bgyid pa/'chang 'dra bar bgyid/
123b2('dul ba): pa/'gyed par bgyid pa/rtsod par bgyid pa/'tha' krol bgyid pa/dge slong ma rnams dang shin tu 'dre bas lhan cig gnas par gyur pa/dge slong rnams kyis gnas nas
123b3('dul ba): dbyung ba'i las bgyid pa/dge slong ma rnams kyis kyang phyag bgyi ba'i 'os ma lags pa'i sdom pa bsgo ba/skra 'greng bar gyur/spu langs par gyur pa las/dge 'dun la spu
123b4('dul ba): stsol bar 'tshal/'byung bar skyod par bgyid/'thun par bgyid pa ston par bgyid/mtshams kyi nang du mchis te bzod pa gsol bar 'tshal bzhin du/de'i gan du sang ste/
123b5('dul ba): 'di skad ces 'phags pa khyod dge 'dun la spu snyol bar ma byed cig/'byung bar ma skyod cig/'thun par byed pa ma ston cig/mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste/bzod pa gsol
123b6('dul ba): bar ma byed cig/bdag cog gis khyed la lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang /dra ba dang /phor bu dang /skra rigs dang /dran par bya ba dang /dri bar bya ba dang /rdzu ba'i sman dang /
123b7('dul ba): sdong bu'i sman dang /lo ma'i sman dang /me tog gi sman dang /'bras bu'i sman dus su rung ba dang /thun tshod du rung ba dang /zhag bdun du rung ba dang /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rung ba rnams//
124a1('dul ba): dang cis dang ces brel ba de dang des mi brel bar bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes smra ba'i dge slong ma de dag la dge slong ma mang pos bzhams te bsgo la/dge slong
124a2('dul ba): ma mang pos de dag la gzhams te bsgo yang /gzhi de nyid la nin gyis mchog tu 'dzin cing /mngon par zhen pa 'di ni bden gyi/gzhan ni rmongs pa'o zhes rje su tha snyad 'dogs te//
124a3('dul ba): de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis/dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams la gsol ba dang /bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad do//tshe dang ldan pa gang dag dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde 'di
124a4('dul ba): dag la gsol ba dang /bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/gang dag mi brtsod pa dag ni gsungs shig/dge 'dun gyis bzod/
124a5('dul ba): cing gnang nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar mdzad lags te 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du
124a6('dul ba): 'dzin to//de dag la gsol ba dang /bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba na/gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu 'dzin cing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyis gzhan ni rmongs
124a7('dul ba): pa'o zhes rje su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i skabs de/dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong dag la smra so//dge slong rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la gsel to//de nas bcom ldan
124b1('dul ba): 'das kyis nga'i nyan thos ma rnams kyis don shes pa dang /ngas bslab pa'i gzhi yang legs par bcas par 'gyur snyam nas/byung ba 'di dang /gleng gzhi 'di dang /dngos po 'di dang /
124b2('dul ba): skabs 'di la gnyi ga'i dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do zhes bya ba nas bslab pa bcas pa'i bar du'o//yang dge slong ma gang dge slong gang zhig dge 'dun 'thun pas gnas nas dbyung ba'i
124b3('dul ba): las byas pa'i dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis kyang phyag bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i sdom pa bsgo ba'i dge slong de skra 'greng bar gyur/spu langs par gyur pa las/dge 'dun la spu snyol
124b4('dul ba): bar byed/'byung bar skyed par byed/'thun par byed po snyan par byed/mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste bzod pa gsol bar byed par shes bzhin du/'di skad ces 'phags pa khyod dge
124b5('dul ba): 'dun la spu snyal bar ma byed cig/'byung bar ma skyod cig/'thun par byed pa ma ston cig/mtsha sras kyi nang du 'dug ste bzod pa gsol bar ma byed cig/de lta bas ni 'thab
124b6('dul ba): mo byed pa ma gtong zhig/bdag gis khyod la lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang /dra ba dang /phor bu dang /ska rags dang /dran par bya ba dang /dri bar bya ba dang /rtsa ba dang /sdong
124b7('dul ba): bu dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu'i sman du su rung ba dang /thun tshod du rung ba dang /zhag bdun du rung ba dang ji srid 'chi'i bar du rung ba rnams dang /ci dang cis brel ba de dang
125a1('dul ba): dasal snyan byu saspyan/dag smang shAdu dun na nas kyis 'ang smra nas nam khyed dge slong gi dge 'dun 'thun pa rnams
125a2('dul ba): gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa/dge slong mor dge 'dun mas kyang phyag bye ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i sdom pa bsgo ba'i dge slong de/sgra 'greng bar gyur/spu langs par gyur pa
125a3('dul ba): las/dge 'dun la spu snyol bar byed/'byung bar spyod par byed/'thun par byed pa ston par byed/mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste/bzod pa gsol bar byed par shes bzhin du/
125a4('dul ba): 'di skad ces 'phags pa khyud dge 'dun la spu snyol bar ma byed cig/'byung bar ma spyod cig/'thun par byed pa ston par ma byed cig/mtshams kyi nang du 'dug ste bzod par
125a5('dul ba): gsol bar ma byed cig/de lta bas ni 'thab mo bred pa ma gtong zhig/bdag cag gis khyod la lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang /dra ba dang /phor bu dang /ske rags dang /dran
125a6('dul ba): par bya ba dang /de bar bya ba dang /rtsa ba dang /sdong bu dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu'i sman dus su rung ba dang /thun tshad du rung ba dang /zhag bdun du rung ba dang /ji srid
125a7('dul ba): 'tsho'i bar du rung ba rnams dang /ci dang ces brel ba de dang des mi brel par bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes smra ba na/phu nu mo gnas nas phyung ba'i rje su phyogs pa dang /mi mthun par byang
125b1('dul ba): ba'i phyir smra ba 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces de skad bsgo bar bya'o//gal te dge sbyong ma rnams kyis dge slong ma de la de skad bsgo ba na/gzhi de gtong ba de lhu na legs/gal te
125b2('dul ba): gtong bar mi byed na/gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir/lan gnyis ldan gsum gyi bar du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/yang dag par bstan par bya'o//lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar
125b3('dul ba): du yang dag par bsgo//yang dag par bstan po na gzhi de gtong ba de lta na legs/gal te gtong bar mi byed na/dge slong ma de yang gnas nas byung ba'i rjesu 'jug pa'i phyir//
125b4('dul ba): phas pham par gyur pa yin pas gnas par mi bya'o//yang dge slong ma ga zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde'o//dge slong gang zhig ces bya ba ni/'thab mo byed pa/mi bde bar byed pa/gre skyes so//
125b5('dul ba): dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun no//gnas nas dbyung ba'i les byas pa zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang /bzhi'i las kyis so//dge slong ma'i dge 'dun
125b6('dul ba): zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ma'o//phyag bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i sdom pa bsgo ba zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang /bzhi'i las kyis//dge slong de zhes bya ba
125b7('dul ba): ni gre skyes so//sgra 'greng bar gyur/spu langs par gyur pa las/dge 'dun la spu snyol bar byed ces bya ba nas/shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis mthong ba'am/de la
126a1('dul ba): gzhan gyis smras par gyur naso//de lta bas na 'thab mo byed pa ma gtong zhi ga ces bya ba ni/zhi bar ma byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go/smra na zhes bya ba ni zer na'o//
126a2('dul ba): 'phags pa khyod ces bya ba ni sgra 'greng ba spu langs pa/gre skyes so//dge 'dun la spu snyol bar ma byed cig ces bya ba nas/'thab mo byed pa ma gtong zhig ces bya ba ni dge
126a3('dul ba): 'dun la bzod pa ma gsol cig ces bya ba'i don to//bdag gis khyod la lhung bzed dang /chos gos dang zhes bya ba la sol ba bsnyen bkur bya'o zhe bya ba'i bar nas/dge slong
126a4('dul ba): mdo la zhes bya ba ni bcu gnyis sde'o//dge slong ma rnams kyis shes bya ba ni chos 'dri pa'i dge slong ma rnams kyis so//de skad bsgo bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces sgra
126a5('dul ba): par bya ste/bzhams te bsgo ba sde ma ji lta ba bzhin du bsgo bar bya ba'o//gal te dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong ma de la de skad bsgo ba ni/gzhi de gtong ba de lta na legs/
126a6('dul ba): shes bya ba ni bzang ba'o//gal te gtong bar mi byed na gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir/lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang dag par bsgo bar bya/yang dag par bstan
126a7('dul ba): par bya zhes bya ba ni sngar gsal ba dang /bzhi'i los kyis ji ltar bsgo ba bzhin du'o//yang dag par bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni/yang dag par bston pa na'o//de la lhung
126b1('dul ba): ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ji tsam du dge slong mas/dge slong 'thab mo byed pa zhes bya ba nas//thang dkrol byed pa/dge 'dun gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa/dge slong ma rnams
126b2('dul ba): kyis phyag bya ba'i 'os ma yin pa'i sdom pa bsgo ba zhes bya ba'i ber dang /shis bzhin du 'di skad ces bdag gis khyod la lhung bzed kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o zhes smras na nyes byasu
126b3('dul ba): 'gyur ro//chos gos kyis kyang zhes byas su 'gyur ro//dra bas kyang nyes byasu 'gyuraro//khor lus kyang nyes byasu 'gyuraro//ska rag+sa kyis kyang nywa byas su 'gyur ro//ci dang cis bral ba de dang des ma brel ba rau bya'i
126b4('dul ba): zhes bya ba thams cad du nyes bya su 'gyur ro//bzhams te bsgo ba na/gzhi de gtong ba de lta na legs/gal te mi gtong na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//las dang po'i tshig
126b5('dul ba): brjod pa ma rdzogs par gal tau gtong ba de lta na legs/ji ste gtong bar mi byed la/tshig rdzogs par gyur pa na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//las gnyis pa'i tshig brjod pa ma
126b6('dul ba): rdzogs par gal te gtong ba de lta na legs/ji ste gtong bar mo byed la tshig rdzogs par gyur na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//las gsum pa'i tshig brjod pa yang ma rdzogs la 'thun
126b7('dul ba): par chos ma yin par byas pa dang /mi mthun pas chos ma yin par byas pa dang /mi mthun pas chos bzhin du byas pa dang /chos ji lta ba dang /'dul ba ji lta ba dang /ston pas
127a1('dul ba): bstan pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ma byas na ltung ba med do//las gsum pa'i tshig brjod pa yang rdzogs la/chos ji lta ba dang /'dul ba ji lta ba dang /ston pas bstan
127a2('dul ba): pa ji lta ba de bzhin du byas kyang gzhi de stong par mi byed na/dge slong ma de la phas pham pa'i ltung bar byung bar gyur pa yin no//las dang po po la sogs pa la ltung ba med de//
127a3('dul ba): dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa las/phas pham par gyur pa brgyad pa rdzogs so////pham pa'i skabasu dge slong ma bcu gnyis po dag bsko bar mi bya'o zhes gsungs
127a4('dul ba): pa de la/gal te 'ga' zhig bcu gnyis po gang yin zhes 'dri bar byed na/'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/gnas khang bsgo ba dang /kha zas bsgo ba dang /thug pa 'drim pa
127a5('dul ba): dang /so shing 'drim pa dang /phran tshegs 'drim pa dang snod spyad 'grub pa dang /snod spyad bged pa dang /gos bged pa dang /dbyar gyi ras chen 'du ba dang /dbyar gyi ras chen
127a6('dul ba): bged pa dang /mngag zhugs pa dang /mdzes chos pa rnams//sdom la//sman byed pa dang gzhi med dang /gsum pa bgo tsam cha las la ni//bzhi po ni yang rung byar
127a7('dul ba): bya/lnga pa chags pa med pa ste//nyin mo mchen mo lam 'gro dang /chu klung pha rol bsgral po'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon
127b1('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//de'i tshe ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po zhes bya ba/mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams dang /gtam 'dre ba dang /phebs par
127b2('dul ba): smra ba/smos 'dren 'grogs bshes/yid bcugs pa/khyim du 'jugs par byed pa yin pas/gang yang rung ba dag la bu mo sbyin par byed pa de dag kyang /ri dgas 'dzin gyi
127b3('dul ba): buM nag po la 'di skad ces nag po ma la khye'u de mkhas pa dang /le lo med pa dang /sgrub phod pa dang /bu mo la bza' ba dang /bgo ba mang po sbyin nus pa dang /las chung ngu 'bogs
127b4('dul ba): bar byed pa yin nam zhes 'dri bar byed do//gal te des 'di skad ces kyi khye'u de ni snying nis mkhas pa/le lo med pa/sgrub phod pa/bu mo de la bza' ba dang /bgo ba mang po sbyin nus pa
127b5('dul ba): chu 'tsho par byed pa yin no zhes bstan par gyur na/de de dag la sbyin par byed do//gal te 'di skad ces/kye khye'u de ni snying nas mi mkhas pa/le lo can/sgrub mi phod pa bu mo de
127b6('dul ba): la bza' ba dang /bgo ba mang po sbyin mi nus pa/las chung ngu 'o bogs par byed pa ma yin no zhes bstan par gyur na/de de dag la sbyin par mi byed do//de bzhin du bu mo slong bar
127b7('dul ba): byed pa de dag kyang /ri dgas 'dzin kyi bu nag po la 'di skad ces/ma la bu mo de mkhas pa dang /sgrub phod pa dang /bu mo de bag yod par khyim na gnas par nus sam zhes
128a1('dul ba): /'dra bar byed do zhes bya ba nas lhag pa rnams kyang khye'u la ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o//gang yang rung ba dag gis bu ma sbyin lags par gyur pa
128a2('dul ba): na de dag 'di skad ces/bdag cog gis ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po la dris nas/bu mo byin pa'i khye'u de yang mkhas pa le lo med pa/sgrub phod pa/bu mo de la bza' ba
128a3('dul ba): dang /bgo ba mang po sbyin nus pa/las chung ngu 'bogs par byed pa yin pas/gang dag l-i ri dgaso 'dzin gyi bu nag po dang /gtam 'dres pa/phebs par smra ba zhes bya ba
128a4('dul ba): nas/khyim du 'jug par byed pa yod pa de dag la yang /'di lta bur 'gyur ro zhes bsngags pa brjod par byed do//de bzhin du gang yang rung ba dag gis bu mo sbyin nyes par
128a5('dul ba): gyur pa no//de dag 'di skad ces bdag cag gis ri dgas 'dzin kyi bu nag po la dris nas bu mo byin na/khyo'u de yang mi mkhas pa/le lo can sgrub mi phod pa/bu mo de la
128a6('dul ba): bza' ba dang /bgo ba mang po sbyin mi nus pa las chung ngu 'bogs par byed pa ma yin pas/grong dag la ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag po dang /gtami 'dres pa zhes bya ba nas/
128a7('dul ba): khyim du 'jug par byed pa yod pa de dag la yang /'di lta bur 'gyur ro zhes bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par byed do/khye'u la ji lta ba bzhin du/bu mo la yod sbyar
128b1('dul ba): bar bya'o//de'i tshe ri dgas 'dzin gyi nu nag po la dus gcig tu bsngags pa dang /bsngags pa yin pa byung bar gyur to//de nas dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde rnams kyis ri dgas 'dzin gyi bu nag pa
128b2('dul ba): las tshig blangs te/smyan byed cing 'jug pa ma yin pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed pa de dag la/bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams 'phya bar byed pa'i skabs de/bcom ldan 'das la dge
128b3('dul ba): slong rnams kyis gsol to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nga'i nyan thos ma'i dge 'dun rnams kyis/don shes pa dang /ngas bslab pa'i gzhi yang legs par bcas par 'gyur ro snyam
128b4('dul ba): nas/byung ba 'di dang /gleng gzhi 'di dang /dngos po 'di dang /skabs 'di la dge slong ma'i dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa
128b5('dul ba): ste/mkhyen bzhin du rmad kyi mi mkhyen par ma yin/dus su yin gyi dus ma yin par ma yin/don dang ldan par yin gyi don dang mi ldan par ma yin to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/
128b6('dul ba): rnams ni/'di lta ste don dang mi ldan par rmed pa ni chu lan gyis bzlog par mdzad pa yin no//de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/'di lta ste/don dang ldan par rmed pa la
128b7('dul ba): dus mkhyen pa yin pas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag larmas pa/dge slong ma khyed kyis 'di ltar tshul ma yin pa/mi mdzes pa de lta bu byas
129a1('dul ba): pa bden nam/bcom ldan 'das bgyis pa med do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcu gnyis sde la/dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa/rung ba ma
129a2('dul ba): yin pa/tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad pa
129a3('dul ba): mdzad nas/dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la bka' stsal pa/dge slong ma dag de lta bas ni/ngas phan yon bcu po 'di lta ste/dge 'dun bsdu bar bya ba'i phyir dang zhes bya ba nas/
129a4('dul ba): yang dag par gzigs nas/'dul ba la nyan thos ma rnams kyis bslang ba'i gzhi bca' bar bya'o zhes bya ba bslab pa bcas pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o//yang dge slong ma gang
129a5('dul ba): bud med la skyes pa'i tshig gam/skyes pa la bud med kyi tshig gis chung ma nyid dam mdzad na mo nyid du sman byed na/the na thang 'gra' phrad pa yang rung ste/chos ni dang po nyid kyis
129a6('dul ba): ltung bar 'gyur la/nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa ste/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//yang dge slong mo gang zhes bya ba ni dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde'o//bud med la skyes
129a7('dul ba): ba'i tshig gam/skyes pa la bud med kyi tshig gis zhes bya ba ni/bud med kyi tshig skyes pa la brjod nas sam/skyes po'i tshig bud med la brjod naso//chung ma nyid ces bya ba
129b1('dul ba): ni/chung ma bdun po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang rin chas nyos pa dang /btsan phrogs su thob pa dang /dang sam du 'dus pa dang /gos zas kyis 'chos pa dang kha dum pa dang /bdun pa
129b2('dul ba): ni thang 'ga' phrad pa'o//de la chu tshigs kyis byin pa gang zhe na/bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang pha ma dag gis skyes pa la/'di ni khyod kyi chung ma/skye dgu'i bdag mo byos shig
129b3('dul ba): ces skyor chus byin zhing /de de'i chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mor gyur nas/des de 'di la gzhan bdag 'dod pa dag gis phyir/spyod par ma gyur cig ces bsrungs pa/shin
129b4('dul ba): tu bsrungs pa/sbas pa shin tu sbas pa de ni chu tshigs kyis byin pa zhes bya'o//rin chas nyos pa'i chung ma gang zhe na/bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang /skyes pas 'di ni//
129b5('dul ba): bdag gi chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mor bya'o zhes/pha ma las rin cha mdo yang rung nyung yang rung bas nyos shing de skye dgu'i bdag mor gyur nas des 'di la gzhan dag 'dod pa
129b6('dul ba): dag gi phyir spyod par ma gyur cig ces bsrungs pa/shin tu bsrungs pa/sbas pa shin tu sbas pa de ni rin chas nyos pa'i chung ma zhes bya'o//btsan phyogasasu thob pa'i chung ma
129b7('dul ba): gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rgyal pos dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po glang po'i tshogs dang /rta pa'i tshogs dang /shing rta'i tshigs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon te
130a1('dul ba): ma phebs pa ni phab/phebs pa ni cham du phab nas/se ma nangs su dbang bar bsgo ba de'i tshe/mis rgyas po rgyal mtshan du byas nas bud med dam
130a2('dul ba): gzhon nu gang yin pa de dag gi chung ma 'am skyes dgu'i bdag mor bya'o zhes phrogs shing zhes bya ba nas/bdag gi 'di la gzhan dag 'dod pa'i phyir spyod par ma gyur cig
130a3('dul ba): ces bya ba'i bar gang yin pa ni/btsan 'phrog su thob pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang ba can phrog su thob pa ni 'di lta ste/tshem rkun po grong khyer 'joms pa dang /grong 'joms pa
130a4('dul ba): dang /ljongs 'joms pa de dag gis rang gi srog dang bsngos nos grong khyer gzhom par byas/grong dang ljongs gzhom pa byas nas/bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang yin pa 'di
130a5('dul ba): bdag gi chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mor bya'o zhes phrogs shing zhes bya ba na/bdag gas 'di la gzhan dag 'dod pa'i phyir spyod par ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i bar 'di yang
130a6('dul ba): bcan phrog su thobo pa zhes bya'o//dang som du 'dus pa'i chung ma gang zhe na/bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang dang rang gi dad pa dang /bcugs pa dang /dgo' bas skyes pa'i
130a7('dul ba): gan du song ste/'di skad ces rje'i sras bdag gis khyod kyi btsun mo skye dgu'i bdag mor bgyi'o zhes smras la/des kyang de chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mor byas te zhes
130b1('dul ba): bya ba nas/bdag gis 'dri la gzhan dag 'dod pa'i phyir/spyod par ma gyur cig ces bya ba'i bar 'do no//dang snyam du 'dus pa'i chung ma zhes bya'o//gos zas kyis 'chos pa'o
130b2('dul ba): chung ma gang zhe na/bud med dam gzhon nu me gang skyes pa'i gan du song ste/'di skad ces rje'i sras khyod kyis bdag la gos dang zas stsol cig dang /bdag gise rje'i sras
130b3('dul ba): khyod kyis chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mo bgyi'i zhes smraso la/des kyang de la gos dag byin nA/des de chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mo byas te zhes bya ba nas/bdag gi 'di la gzhan
130b4('dul ba): dog 'dod pa'i phyir/spyod par ma gyur cig ces bya bar 'di ni gos zas kyis 'tshe sau pa'i chung ma zhes bya'o//kha dum pa'i chung mo gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bud med dam gzhon nu
130b5('dul ba): ma gang nor mang yang rung nyung yang rung khyer ta skyes smig du song nas/'di skad ces rje'i sras mkhyen par mdzod cig/khyod kyi nor gyi phung po dang /bdag gi nor gyi phung po gang lags pa
130b6('dul ba): de gcig tu bsdus nas/bdag cag mnyam du 'tshe zhing 'dod pa la longs spyod par bgyis la/gang gi tshe bdog cag las khye'u 'am bu mo gang dag mchis par gyur pa de dag
130b7('dul ba): kyang bdag cag li dus la bab cing shi ba na/sbyin pa dge sbyin zhing /bsod nams dag byas nas/'di bdag cag gi pha ma gang du skyes pa der rjesu 'gro bar gyur cig ces yon
131a1('dul ba): bsngo bar bgyid par 'gyur bar babya'o zhes smras la/des kyang de'i chung ma skye dgu'i bdag mor byas nas/bdag gi 'di la gzhan dag 'dud pa'o/
131a2('dul ba): phyir/spyod par ma gyur cig ces bsrungs shin tu bsrungs/spos shin tu sbas pa de ni kha dum pa'i chung ma zhes bya'o//thang 'ga' yang phrad pa'i chung ma gang zhe na/'di
131a3('dul ba): lho ste/bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang la skyes pas de'i dus kyi glu byin nas/'di dang bdag yud tsam zhig lhan cig yongasu spyad par bya'o snyam nas/des de bsrungs pa
131a4('dul ba): zhes bya ba'i bar 'di ni thang 'ga' phrad pa'i chung ma zhes bya ste/'do dag ni chung ma bdun zhes bya ba yin no//mdze' na mo bcu zhes bcu zhes bya ba la/bcu gang zhe na/mas
131a5('dul ba): bsrungs pa dang /phas bsrungs pa dang /ming pos bsrungs pa dang /phu nus bsrungs pa dang /sgyug mos bsrungs pa dang /gyos pos bsrungs pa dang /nyi dus bsrungs pa dang /rigs
131a6('dul ba): kyis bsrungs pa dang /rus kyis bsrungs pa dang /rnam par 'khrugs pa med pa ni bcu pa'o//mas bsrungs pa'i mdza' na mo gang zhes na/'di lta ste/bud med dam gzhon
131a7('dul ba): nu ma gang zhig gi tshe khyim thab myos par gyur pa 'am/sems 'khrugs pa 'am/tsher ba dag gis nyen pa 'am/rgyal pos 'jigs nas yul 'khor gzhan dang /yul
131b1('dul ba): gzhan du bros par gyur tam/bsad dam/bcings sam/spyugs sam/rab tu byung ngam/shi bar gyur pa na/de la mas bdag gi 'di la 'ga' zhig gis ma brtags par nan gyis bcan thabs
131b2('dul ba): su 'dod pa'i phyir/spyod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/bsrungs shin tu bsrungs/sbas shin tu sbas par gyur gyur pa 'di ni/mas bsrungs pa'i mdza' na mo zhes bya'o//phas bsrungs
131b3('dul ba): pa'i mdza' na mo gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang zhig gang gi tshe/khyim thab myos par gyur tam zhes bya ba nas/rgyas par ma shi bar gyur pa na/de la phas bdag
131b4('dul ba): gi 'di la 'ga' zhig gis ma brtags par nan gyis btsan thabs su 'dod pa'i phyir spyod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/bsrungs shin rna bsrungs/sbas shin tu sbas par gyur
131b5('dul ba): pab 'di ni/phas bsrungs pa'i mdza' na mo zhes bya'o//ming pos bsrungs pa'i mdza' na mo gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang zhig gang gi tshe/khyim thab smos par gyur
131b6('dul ba): tam/sems 'khrugs pa 'am zhes bya ba nas/pha ma shi bar gyur pa na/de la ming pos bdag gis 'di la 'ga' zhig gis zhes bya ba nas/'dod pa'i spyod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o/
131b7('dul ba): snyam nas/bsrungs shes bya ba'i bar 'di ni ming pos bsrungs pa'i mdza' na mo yin no//ming pos bsrungs pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ku nu mes bsrungs pa yong brjod par bya'o//skyug
132a1('dul ba): mos bsrungs pa'i mdza' nu mo gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bud med dam/gzhon nu ma gang zhig/gang gi tshe khyim bdag smyos par gyur tam/sems 'khrugs par
132a2('dul ba): gyur ces bya ba nas/pha ma shi bar gyur tam/ming po dang phu nu mo shi bar gyur pa na/de la skyug mos 'di skad ces bdag gi bul lta badz+ra lta bar khyod la yang de lta bu yin pas khyod
132a3('dul ba): bza' ba dang /bgo ba bdag gis sbyar gyis mna' ma dga' bar gyis shig/mna' ma 'dug par gyis shig ces smras nas/bdag gi 'di la 'ga' zhig gis ma brtags par
132a4('dul ba): na gyis btsan thab su 'dod pa'i phyir spyod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/bsrungs shin tu bsrungs/sbas shing tu sbas par gyur pa 'di ni/sgyug mos bsrungs pa zhes bya'o//skyug
132a5('dul ba): mos bsrungs pa ji lta ba bzhin du/gyos pos bsrungs pa yang brjod par bya'o//nye dus bsrungs pa'i mdza' na mo gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang zhig/khyim
132a6('dul ba): thab spyos par gyur tam/sems 'khrugs par gyur ces bya ba nas/pha ma shi bar gyur tam/ming po dang /phu nu mo dang /sgyug mo dang /gyos po shi bar gyur pa na/de nye du'i drung du
132a7('dul ba): gnas shing de la nye du rnams kyis bdag cag gi 'di la 'ga' zhig gis ma brtags par nan gyis btsan thab su 'dod pa'i phyir spyod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/bsrungs//
132b1('dul ba): shin tu bsrungs/sbas shin tu sbas par gyur pa 'di ni/nye dus bsrungs pa'i mdza' na mo zhes bya'o//nye du zhes bya ba ni pha mos dang /ma mes gnyi ga'i bdun brgyud gzung ngo //rig
132b2('dul ba): kyis bsrungs pa'i mdza' nam gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bud med gzhan nu ma gung zhig gang gi tshe/khyim thab smyos par gyur tam/sems 'khrugs par gyur ces bya ba'i bar nas/
132b3('dul ba): pham shi bar gyur pa dang /ming po dang /phu nu mo dang /sgyug mo dang /gyos po dang /nye du shi bar gyur pan/de bdag nyid dang /rus gcig pa'i drung na gnas shing /de la de dag gis bdag
132b4('dul ba): cag gi 'di la 'ga' zhig gis ma brtags par na na gyis btsan thabasu 'dod pa'i phyir spyod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/bsrungs shes bya ba'i bar 'di ni/rigs
132b5('dul ba): kyis bsungs pa'i mdza' na mo zhes byaso//rigs shes bya ba ni/bram ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /rje'u rigs dong /dmangs rigs rnamaso//rus kyis bsrungs pa'i mdza'
132b6('dul ba): na mo gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bud med dam gzhon nu ma gang zhog gang gi tshe khyim bdag spros par gyur tam/sems 'khrugs par gyur ces bya ba'i bar nas/pha ma shi bar
132b7('dul ba): gyur tam/mid po dang /phu nu mo dang /sgyug mo dang /gyos po dang /nye du rnams shi bar gyur pa na/de bdag nyid dang /rus cig pa'i dru nga na gnos shing de la de dag gis bdag
133a1('dul ba): cag gi 'di la 'ga' zhig gis ma brtags par nan gyis bcan thab su 'dod pa'i phyir spyod par mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/bsrungs shes bya ba'i bar 'di//
133a2('dul ba): ni/rus kyis bsrungs pa'i mdza' na mo zhes bya'o//rus shes bya ba ni/kud sa'i rus dang /bad sa'i rus dang /shan da ti la'i rus dang /b+ha ra d+h+wa dza'i rus dang /mo'u dgal gyi
133a3('dul ba): rus dang /gar g+ha'i rus dang /go'u ta ma'i rus rnam so//rnam par 'khrugs pa med pa'i mdza' na mo gang zhe na/dge slong ma dang /dpyod pa ma dang /kun tu rgyu mo dang /khyim thab
133a4('dul ba): las gzhan dang mi nyal ba'i bud med dang /brtul zhugs kyi gzhi chos spyod par byed ma ste 'di dag ni mdza' na mo bcu zhes bya'o//smyan byed na zhes bya ba ni phrin byed pa'o//tha na thang
133a5('dul ba): 'ga' zhes bya ba ni/tha na yud tsam yang ngo chos 'di ni zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa chos kyi sgrar bstan pa 'di'o//dang po nyid kyis ltung bar gyur la zhes bya ba ni mod la ltung bar
133a6('dul ba): 'gyur ba'o//nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa dang bcas pa'o//dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes bya ba ni ltung ba de gnyi ga'i dge 'dun la rig lus pa dang /gnyi
133a7('dul ba): ga'i dge 'dun dang 'brel ba dang /gnyi ga'i dge 'dun la ston pa yin te/ltung ba de gnyi ga'i dge 'dun las ldang bar 'gyur gyi/gang zag las ni ma yin pa'o//yang
133b1('dul ba): non pham par gyur pa brgyad po 'di ni lhag ma med pa yin la/ltung ba 'di ni lhag ma dang bcas pa yin pa de'i phyir/dge 'dun lhag ma zhes bya'o//de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na
133b2('dul ba): bar sdom la/sprin phrin dge slong ma gnyis dang //spyod lam dang ni sngon 'gro dang //bdag dang bdag min yul-i phyogs tshig/sprin yig log yig chung ma'o//dge slong mas bdag
133b3('dul ba): nyid kyis spring ba mnos te/bdag nyid kyis phrin phar yang skye la//bdag nyid kyis tshur yang skyel na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas bdag nyid kyis spring ba mnos te/bdag
133b4('dul ba): nyid kyis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /mngags pas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na//dge 'dun ldog mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas bdag nyid kyis spring ba mnos te/mngag pas phrin phar skyel
133b5('dul ba): bar byed cing /bdog nyid kyis phrin tshur skye la bar byed na//dge 'dun lkog mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas bdag nyid kyis spring ba mnos te//mngags pas phrin phar yang skyel bar
133b6('dul ba): byed cing /mdags pas phrin tshur yang skyel ba ro byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas mngags pa las bdag nyid kyis spring pa mnos te/bdag nyid kyis
133b7('dul ba): phrini phar yang skyel bar byed cing /bdag nyid kyis phri na tshur yang skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas mngags pa las bdag nyid kyis spring ba mnos
134a1('dul ba): te/bdag nyid kyis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing /mngags pas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas mngags
134a2('dul ba): pa las bdag nyid kyis phrin spring pa mnos te/medagus pas phrin par skyel bar byed cing /bdag nyid kyis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas
134a3('dul ba): mngag pa las/bdag nyid kyis spring pa mnos te mngags pas phrin par yang sprul par byed cing /mngags pas phrin tshur yong skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//
134a4('dul ba): dge slong mas mngags pas/mngags pa las bdag nyid kyis spring ba mnos te bdag nyid kyis phrin par yang skyel bar byed cing /bdag nyid kyis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/
134a5('dul ba): dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas mngags pas mngags pa las bdag nyid kyis spring pa mnos te bdag nyid kyis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing /mngag so bas
134a6('dul ba): mngags pas phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas mngags pas mngags pa las/bdag nyid kyis spong pa mnos te/mngags
134a7('dul ba): bas mngags pas phran par yang skyel bar byed cing /bdag nyid kyis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong ma mngags pas mngags
134b1('dul ba): pas las/bdag nyid kyis spring pa mnos te/mngags pas mngags pas phrin phar yang skyel par byed cing /mngags pas mngags pas phran tshur yang skyel bar byed na/dge
134b2('dul ba): 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong ma gnyis kyis gnyi gas sprid pa mnos te/gnyi gros phrin phor yang skyel bar byed cing /gnyi gas phrin tshur yang skyol bar byed na/gnyi
134b3('dul ba): ga la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong ma gnyis kyis gnyi gas spring pa mnos te/de na gcig 'di skad ces re shig kho mo'i don du phrin par sgrol la/phrin tshur
134b4('dul ba): yang skyol cig ces zer nas/des de'i don du phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing /phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/gnyi ga la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong ma gnyis
134b5('dul ba): kyis gnyi gas sprid pa mnos te/de na gcig 'di skad ces kho mo ni phrin phar ni skyal lo//phrin tshur ni mi skyol lo zhes zer na de gnyis las gang phrin phar yang skyel bar byed
134b6('dul ba): cing /phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na de la ni dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur la/gang phrin phar ni skyel par byed la/phrin tshur ni skyel bar mi byed pa de la ni nyes pa sbom po gnyisu
134b7('dul ba): 'gyuraro//dge slong mo gnyis kyis gnyi ga'i spring pa mnas te/de na gcig 'di skad ces kho mo ni phrin par yang mi skyel la/chur yang mi skyel lo zhes zer na/de gnyis las gang
135a1('dul ba): na smra na rgan chung ru sto bar byung ba dul sa dus rgyam shA/kA sa yang smra rlus
135a2('dul ba): sU ga ma byud 'di zhe sa sa hA //dge nga'i gnyis kyi ba nasate/gtogs phrin tshul ba /
135a3('dul ba): na byed ba sprin hU~M mi 'didis sa ma ra 'gyur ma/mi kyi spyi gcig tud med
135a4('dul ba): na hU~M du gyu thuname sa dag su ma 'i 'd-i sa kyis jigs ma khyod skyes du 'dil 'din //ng+ge chung meng 'di dum/
135a5('dul ba): na sa rnam doste/ /pa po 'di rlungs nachud skye ba
135b1('dul ba): 'dzin gyis shig ces zur nus sam zhes smras la/gal te dge slong ma des spring pa rnam pa de lta bu mnos te/phrin par skyel bar byed dam/phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/dgeng
135b2('dul ba): lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong ma gcig dang bud med gcig dang skyes pa gcigaji lta ba de bzhin du dge slong ma gnyis dang bud med gnyis dang /skyes pa gnyis dang /
135b3('dul ba): dudage slong ma rab tu mang po dang /bud med rab tu mang po dang /skyes pa rab tu mang po la yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o//lam 'gro ba ji lta ba bzhin du sdod pa dang 'dug pa dang /nyal
135b4('dul ba): bdag dang yang rgyas par brjod par bya'o//dge slong ma bdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong ma dang /phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge spyang ma gnyis las mdun du 'gro ba'i dge slong mas snying pa mnas
135b5('dul ba): te/mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong mas phrin phar mang skyel bar byed cing /mdun du 'gro bu'i dge sbyong mas phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong ma la dge 'dun
135b6('dul ba): lhag mar 'gyur ro//mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong mas spring pa mo nos te mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong mas/phrin phar skyel por byed cing /phyi bzhin 'bring ba'i dge sbyong mas phrin tshur stsol
135b7('dul ba): bar byed na mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong ma la nyes pa sbom po gnyi su 'gyur ro/phyi bzhin 'brong ba'i dge sbyong ma lo nyes po sbom po gcig tu 'gyur ro//mdun du 'gro ba'i dge slong
136a1('dul ba): mas spring ba mnos te/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong mas phrin par skyel bar byed cing /mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong mas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/mdun
136a2('dul ba): du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong ma la nyes pa sbom po gnyi su 'gyur la/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma la ni nyes pa sbom po gcig tu 'gyur ro//mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong mas
136a3('dul ba): spring pa mnos te/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong mas phrin par yong skyel bar byed cing /phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong mas phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/mdun du 'gro
136a4('dul ba): ba'i dge sbyong ma la nyes pa sbom po gcig tu 'gyur la/phyi bzhin 'brang po'i dge sbyong ma la nyes pa sbom po gnyi su 'gyur ro//phyi bzhin 'brang de'i dge sbyong mos sprid pa mnos te//
136a5('dul ba): phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong mas phrin phar yang skyel por byed cing /phyi bzhin 'brong ba'i dge sbyong mas phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/bya bzhin 'bring ba'i dge sbyong ma la dge
136a6('dul ba): 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//phyi bzhin 'byung ba'i dge sbyong mos spring pa mnos te/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong mas phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing /mdun du 'gro ba'i dge
136a7('dul ba): spong mas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma la nyes pa sbom po gnyis su 'gyur lo/mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong mo la ni nyes pa sbom po gcig tu
136b1('dul ba): 'gyur ro//phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong mas spyod pa mnas te/mdun du 'gro ba'i dge slong mas phrin par skyel bar byed cing /phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong mas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/phyi bzhin
136b2('dul ba): 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ma la nyes pa sbom po gnyi su 'gyur la//mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong ma la ni nyes pa sbom po gcig tu 'gyur ro//phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong mas spyod pa mnos te//mdun
136b3('dul ba): du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong mas phrin par yang skyel bar byed cing /mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong mas phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/phyi bzhin 'byung ba'i dge sbyong ma la nyes pa sbom po gcig tu 'gyur
136b4('dul ba): la/mdun du 'gro ba'i dge sbyong ma la ni nyes pa sbom po gnyi su 'gyur ro//khyim po dag ni gnyis te/bdog po dang /bdag po ma yin pa'o//de la bdag po zhes bya ba ni bu mo sbyin pa dag 'phrog
136b5('dul ba): pa'i bdag por gyur cing de rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi nang du song yang rung /rigs pa tshogs pa'i nang du song yang rung ste/de'i tshig yang dag pa ma yin pa yang gzung bar 'os par gyur pa gang
136b6('dul ba): yin pa de ni bdag po zhes bya'o//bdag po ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni/bu mo sbyin pa dang /'phrogs pa'i bdag blor gyur pa ma yin zhing /de rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi nang du song yang rung
136b7('dul ba): rigs pa tshogs pa'i nang du song yang rung ste/de'i tshig yang dag par gzung bar 'os par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bdag po ma yin pa zhes bya'o//dge slong mas bdag pos las spring
137a1('dul ba): ba mnos te/bdag po la phrin par yang skyel bar byed cing /bdag po la phrin tshur yang snrel byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas
137a2('dul ba): bdag bos las spring ba mnos te/bdag po la phrin par yang skyel bar byed cing /bdag po ma yin pa la phrin tshur skyel bar byed ni/nyes pa sbom po gnyis dang /nyes byas
137a3('dul ba): gcig tu 'gyur ro//dge slong mas bdag po las spring pa mnos te bdag po ma yin pa la phrin par skyel bar byed cing /bdag po la phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/nyes pa sgom
137a4('dul ba): po gnyis dang /nyes byas gcig tu 'gyur ro//dge slong mas bdage po las spring pa mnos te/bdag po ma yin pa la phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /bdag po ma yin pa la phrin
137a5('dul ba): tshur skyel bar byed na/nyes pa sbom po gcig dang /nyes byas gnyi su 'gyuraro//dge slong mas bdag po ma yin pa la sa spring ba mnos te/bdag po ma yin pa las drin pa
137a6('dul ba): yang sgrol bar byed cing /bdag po ma yin pa la phrin tshur yong skyel bar byed na/nyes byas gsum du 'gyur ro//dge slong mes bdag po ma yin pa las sprid pa mnos te
137a7('dul ba): bdag po la phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /bdag po ma yin pa lo phrin tshul skyel bar byed na/nyes pa sbom po gcig dang /nyes byas gnyi su 'gyur ro//dge slong mas bdag
137b1('dul ba): po ma yin pa las spring ba mnas te/bdag po ma yin pa la phrin par skyel bar byed cing /bdag po la phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/nyes pa sbom po gcig dang /nyes byas gnyi su
137b2('dul ba): 'gyur ro//dge slong mas bdag po ma yin pa las spring pa mnos te/badrag po las phrin par yang skyel bar byed cing /bdag po la phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/nyes pa sbom po gnyis
137b3('dul ba): dang /nyes byas gcig tu 'gyur ro//rgyud gsum gyis spring pa'i phrin tshur skyel bar 'gyur la/phar skyel bar ni mi 'gyur te/gsum gang zhe na/yul phyogs dang /brda dag mtshan
137b4('dul ba): mas so//ji ltar yul phyogs kyis shes na gang gi tshe kho mo bskyed mos tshal lam/'dun sa 'am/lha'i gnas ga ge mo zhig na 'dug pa khyod kyis mthong ba de'i tshe bya ba de byas
137b5('dul ba): par khyod kyis shes par gyis shig ces bya ba ste/de ltar yul phyogs kyis so//ji ltar brdas she na/gang gi che kho mo snga dro 'am/gung tshigs sam/phyi 'breng na khyod kyis mthong
137b6('dul ba): pab de'i tshe/bya ba de byas par khyod kyis shes par bgyis shig ces bya ba ste/de ltar brngas so//ji ltar mtshan mas she na/gang gi tshe kho mo skra bregaso nas ring por ma lon pa
137b7('dul ba): 'am/sna mo sbyar dmar ser gyon pa 'am/lhung bzed zha nye'o dbyar medab can nam/khar ba lcags sbugs can nam/zhun mar gyi lhung bzed dem/'bru mar gyi lhung bzed daM/
138a1('dul ba): sbrang rtsi'i lhung bzed dam/bur mar gyi dbu ba'i lhung bzad thogs pa khyod kyis mthong ba der tshe/bya ba de byas par khyod kyis shes par gyis shog ces
138a2('dul ba): bya ba ste de ltar mtshan ma'o////bam po bdun pa//rgyud gsum gyis ni snying po'i phrin par bskyal bar yang 'gyur lo/phrin tshur bskyal bar yang 'gyur/
138a3('dul ba): gsum gang zhe na/tshig dang /spring yig dang /lag yig gis so//dge slong mas tshig gis spring pa mnas te/tshigs gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing /tshig gis
138a4('dul ba): phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas tshig gi spring pa mnos te/tshig gis phrin par yang skyel bar byed cing /spring yig gis phrin
138a5('dul ba): chur yang skyel bar byed ni/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas tshig gis spring ba mnos te/spring yig gis phrin par skyel bor byed cing /tshig gis phrin tshur skyel
138a6('dul ba): bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur//dge slong mas tshig gis spring pa mnos te/spring yig gis phrin par skyel bar byed cing /spring yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel
138a7('dul ba): bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas tshig gis spring pa mnos te/spring yig gis phrin par sgrol bar byed cing /yul phyogs dang brda' dang /mtshan mas
138b1('dul ba): phyin chur skul bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas tshig gis sbrid pa mAnas te/tshig gis phrin par yang skyel bar byed cing /tshig gis phrin tshur yang
138b2('dul ba): skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyuraro//dge slong ma'i tshig gis spring ba mnos te/tshig gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing /lhag yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar
138b3('dul ba): byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas tshig gis spring pa mnos te/lag yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /tshig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na
138b4('dul ba): dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas tshig gis spring pa mnos te/lag yig gis phrin par sgrol bar yod byed cing /lag yig gis phrin tshur skyel po
138b5('dul ba): yang byed na/drag 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas tshigs gis sbrid pa mnos te/lug yig gis phrin phor skyel bar byed cing /yul phyogs dang brda' dang
138b6('dul ba): mtshan mas phrin tshur sbrel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas spring yig gis sring bA ma ne swA te/spring yig gis phyin par yong sgyel bar byed
138b7('dul ba): cing /spring yig gis phrini tshu ro yang skyel bar byed na/dge 'duni lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas snying yig gis spring po mnos te/spring yig gis phrin par skye
139a1('dul ba): bar byed cing /tshig gis phrin tshur stsol bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas spring yig gis sbyong ba mnas te/tshig gis dran
139a2('dul ba): par skyel bar byed cing /spring yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas spring yig gis spring ba mnos te/tshig gis phrin par
139a3('dul ba): yang sbrel bar byed cing /tshig gis phrin chur yang sbrel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas spring yig gis snying ba mnus te/spring yig gis phrin par sprul
139a4('dul ba): bar byed cing /yul phyogs dang /brda dang mtshan mas phrin tshur stsol bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas spring yig gis spring ba mnos te/spring yig gis
139a5('dul ba): phrin par yang skyel por byed cing /spring yig gis phrin rgyur yang stsol b.raro byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas snying yig gis sbed pa mnos te/spring yig
139a6('dul ba): gis phrin par skyel bar byed cing /lag yig gis phrin chur stsol bar byed ni/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas spring shA gi rnying ma lag yog gis phrin
139a7('dul ba): par skyel bar byed cing /spring yig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas spring yig gis spring ba mnos te/lag yig gis
139b1('dul ba): phrin par yang skyel bar byed cing /lag yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas spring yig gis spring pa mnos te/spring yig gis
139b2('dul ba): 'phrin par skyel bar byed cing /yul phyogs dang brda dang mtshan mas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyuraro//dge slong mas lag yig gse spring ba
139b3('dul ba): mnos te/lag yi gau gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing /lag yig gis phyin tshur yong skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyuraro//dge slong mas lag yig gis
139b4('dul ba): spring ba mnos te/lag yig gis phrin par skyel bar byed cing /tshig gis phrin tshur skyel por byed no/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyuraro//dge slong mas lag yig gis spring
139b5('dul ba): pa mnos te/tshig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /lag yig gis phrin chu yA skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyu ro//dge slong mas lag yig gis spring po
139b6('dul ba): mnos te/tshig gI phrin par yang skyel bar byed cing /tshig gis phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas lag yig gis spring pa mnis te/
139b7('dul ba): lag yig gis phrin phar skyel b.raro byed cing /yul phyogs dang /brda dang mtshan mos phrin chur skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas lag yig/
140a1('dul ba): glos sbyong pa mnas te/lag yog gis smyon par yang sgrol bar byed rjong /lag yog+sa gis dz+nyAn nur sprul bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag par 'gyu/
140a2('dul ba): dge slong mas lag yig gis spring pa mnos te/lag yig gis phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /spring yig gis phrin tshur stsol bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyuraro//
140a3('dul ba): dge slong mas lag yog gis spring ba mnos te/spring yig gis phrin par skyel por byed cing /lag yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur//
140a4('dul ba): dge slong mas lag yig gis sprid pa mnos te/spring yig gis phrin phar yang skyel bar byed cing /spring yig gis phrin tshur yang skyel bar byed na/dge 'dun lhag mar
140a5('dul ba): 'gyur ro//dge slong mas lag yig gis spring pa mnos te/lag yig gi phrin phar skyel bar byed cing /yul phyogs dang /brda dang mtshan mas phrin tshur skyel bar byed na/
140a6('dul ba): dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//dge slong mas chung ma dang po gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /rin chas nyos pa dang /btsan phrogs su thob pa/'thabs pa'i modo nyid
140a7('dul ba): yin la/'thabs pa'i 'og ma yin pa dang /rtswam bcad pa dang /rde'u gsum gyis mo gtor ba dang /bye rgya byin nas ma btang ba dang /chung ma ma yin par dbang ma gzugs
140b1('dul ba): pa dang /dril ma bsgrags bdag gi sdums byas la 'thun par gyur na/nyes byas gcig tu 'gyur ro//dge slong mas chung ma dang po gsum pa chu tshogs kyis byin pa dang /rin chas//
140b2('dul ba): nyos pa dang /btsan blog su thob pa 'thibs pa'i 'og yon la/'thabs pa'i mod pa yin pa dang /rtse ma bcad pa dang /rde'u gsum gyis ma gtor ba dang /byi rgyu byin nas ma btang
140b3('dul ba): ba dang /chung ma ma yin par dpang ma gtsugs pa dang /dril ma bsgrags pa dag gis sdums byas la/'thun par gyur na nyes byas gnyis su 'gyuraro//dge slong mas chung ma dang
140b4('dul ba): po gsum 'o//chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /rin chas nyes pa dang /btsan thabs su thib pa dong 'thabs pa'i mod dang /'thabs pa'i 'og dang /rtswa bcad pa yin la/
140b5('dul ba): gsum gyis ma gtor ba dang /byi rgyu byin nas ma btang ba dang /chung ma ma yin par dbang ma gtsugs pa dang /dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi sdums byas la/'thun par gyur na/
140b6('dul ba): nyes byas gsum du 'gyuraro//dge slong mas chung ma dang po gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /rin chas nyes pa dang /can phrog su zab pa zhes bya ba nas/de'u gsum gtung
140b7('dul ba): ba'i bar yin la/bye rgya byin nas ma gting ba dang /chung ma ma yin par dbang mo gcugs pa dang /dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi sdums byas lo/'thun par gyur na nyes byas
141a1('dul ba): gsum dang /nyes pa rnam pa gcig tu 'gyur ro//dge slong mas chung ma gsum pa chu tshogs kyis byin pa dang /rin chas nyos pa dang /bcan gragasu
141a2('dul ba): thob pa zhes bya ba nas/bye rgya byin nas btang zhes bya ba'i bar yin la/chung ma ma yin par dbang ma gtsugs pa dang /dril ma bsgrags pa dag gi sdums byas la/'thun
141a3('dul ba): par gyur na nyos byas gsum dang /nyes pa sbom po gnyi su 'gyu ro//dge slong mas zhung ma gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /rin chas nyos pa dang /btsan phrog su thos
141a4('dul ba): pa zhes bya ba nasau/chung ma ma yin par dbang btsugs pa'i bar yin la/dril ma bsgrags pa dag go sdums byas te/'thun par gyur na nyes byas gsum dang /nyes
141a5('dul ba): pa sbom po gsum dang /dge 'dun lhag ma gcig du 'gyur ro//dge slong mas chung ma gsum po chu tshigs kyis byin pa dang /ran chas nyos po dang /pha tsan brog su
141a6('dul ba): thob pa zhes bya ba nas/dril bsgrags pa'i bar dag gi sdums byas la/'thun par gyur na nyes byas gsum dang /nyes pa sbom po bzhi dang /dge 'dun gyi lhag ma
141a7('dul ba): gnyis su 'gyur ro//dge slong mas chung ma de las gzhin pa/'thabs pa'i mod dang /'thabs pa'i 'og tu sdu mas byas la/'thun par gyur na thams cad du
141b1('dul ba): dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur//dge slong ma khyim pa'i khyim du song nas/'dri skad ces ci'i phyir khye'u 'di khyim mi dbub ces zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur//ci'i phyir bu
141b2('dul ba): mo chen mo 'di dgra mar mI gtad zhes zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyuraro//ci'i phyir khye'u 'od gyos po'i thad du mi gtang zhes zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur//ci'i phyir bu ma
141b3('dul ba): 'di khyim bdag gi thad du mi bkri zhes zer na nyes pa sbom por 'gyur//dge slong ma khyim bdag gi khyim du song nas tha na 'di skad ces/ci'i phyir khyim bdag khyod kyis zhal
141b4('dul ba): teta byed pa dag mi gzhag ces zer na nyes byas su 'gyur ro//de bzhin du khyim bdag mo la yang nyes bya su 'gyur ro//las dang po pa la sogs pa la ni lhung po med de//
141b5('dul ba): dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa las/dge 'dun gyi lhag ma dang ba rdzogaso////sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya ka lan da ka gnas pa
141b6('dul ba): na bzhugaso//de'i tshe sdig byung na gyad kyi sna chen po rgyal sde zhes bya ba/phyug pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba/yongasu gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i
141b7('dul ba): nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis mgrin pa/gser dang nor mang po 'byor pa zhig gnaso//des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar
142a1('dul ba): byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed do//de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed kyang /de la bu'ang med bu mo 'ang med do//
142a2('dul ba): bu med pas bu la mngon par dga' ste/do bu'i don du/lha brgya stong du ma la gsol ba 'debs te/'di lta ste/tshangs pa dang /dbang po dang /nye dbang dang /gshin rje dang /
142a3('dul ba): nyi ma dang /lus ngan po dang /kun bgad gzhon nu dang /skye dgu'i bdag po dang /khyab 'jug dang /dbang bdag dang /sa ga dang /las thams cad pa dang /tha skar dang /rlung mar gyi lha
142a4('dul ba): dang /sa'i lha dang /chu lha dang /me lha dang /rlung lha dang /yul 'khor srung dang /'phags skyes po dang /mig mi bzang dang /rnam thos kyis bu dang /nor bu bzang po dang /gang ba
142a5('dul ba): bzang po dang /lngas rtsen dang /lnga len dang /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /'phrogs ma bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang /kun dga' ra ba'i lha dang /nags tshal gyi lha dang /bzhi
142a6('dul ba): mdo'i lha dang /sum mdo'i lha dang /gtor ma len pa'i lha dang /lhan cig skyes pa'i lha dang /chos 'thun pa dang /rtag tu rjesu 'brang ba'i lha de dag dang /gzhan yang lha brgya stong dag la
142a7('dul ba): gsol ba 'debs par byed do//'jig rten na yang lha la gsol ba btab pa'i rgyu las bu dang bu mo dag skyero zhes bya ba 'jig rten pa'i gtam de lta bu yod mod kyi de ni de lta ma
142b1('dul ba): yin te/gal te de ltar gyur du zin na/dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du re re la yang bu stong 'od par 'gyur ro//'on kyang gnas drug po mngon du gyur pa las bu dang bu mo dag skye bar
142b2('dul ba): 'gyur te/drug po gang dag ces na/pha ma gnyis kyis bu rnyed par 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pa yin/bus kyang pha ma rnyed par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa yin/ma
142b3('dul ba): yang rung bar gyur cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa yin/pha ma gnyis chags par gyur cing 'dus pa yin/dri za yang nye bar gnas pa yin/dri zas kyang sems gnyis
142b4('dul ba): po rje su chags pa dang ldan pa 'am/khong khro ba dang ldan pa gang yang rung ba'i sems yongasu thob pa ste/gnas drug po 'di dag mngon du gyur pa las bu dang bu mo dag skye ba yin no//de de ltar lha
142b5('dul ba): brgya stong la gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na/sems can bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas dbang che bar grags pa/sngon gyi sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa srid
142b6('dul ba): pa tha ma pa/spyod pa spyad pa/'ching ba nyams smad pa/thar pa'i tshogs bzung ba/mya ngan las 'das pa la phyogs pa/'khor ba las phyir phyogs pa/srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi
142b7('dul ba): 'pho dang /skye bo don du mi gnyer ba lus tha ma 'dzin pa zhig lha'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas/chung ma do'i mngal du zhugs so//'di na bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig/
143a1('dul ba): shes par bya ba'i gnas lnga rab tu shes te/skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing /skyes pa chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /dus shes shing zla
143a2('dul ba): mtshan shes pa dang /mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang /gang las mngal du zhugs pa de yang shes pa dang /khye'u ra shes shing bu mor shes pa ste/gal te khe'u yin na dku g.yas
143a3('dul ba): par rten cing 'dug la/gal te bu mo yin na dku g.yon par rten cing 'dug pa'o//des kyang bdag la sems can zhugs pa de/dku g.yas par rten ci ngo 'dug pas na/khye'ur
143a4('dul ba): 'gyuraro//snyam du rig nas/dga' zhing mgu la yid rab tu dga' bas khyim thab la smras pa/rje'i sras khyod la bka' mchid snyan pa zhig gsol lo//des smras pa/bzang mo lha
143a5('dul ba): dang mi'i gtam snyan thob par gyur cig/gtam snyan ji lta bu zhig/rje'i sras bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa/ji ltar bdag gi dku g.yas pa mi bde ba las/gor ma
143a6('dul ba): dkum par bdag gis bu rnyed do//de nas gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa rgyal sdes de thos ma thag tu dga' zhing mgu la yid rab tu dga' ste/bzhin pad+ma rgyas pa lta bus dga'
143a7('dul ba): tshig 'di skad ces smras//bzang mo khyod kyi bu de bzhin du skye bar shog cig/kho bos kyang bu sdug pa'i ngo mthong ba dang /kho bos yun ring mo zhig nis bsams pa'i bu yid
143b1('dul ba): la bsams pa bzhin du 'grub pa dang /kho bo dang 'thun par skyo zhing mi 'thun par mi skye ba dang /kha bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /kha bo'i nor rdzas la spyod pa dang //
143b2('dul ba): khro bo'i rigs brgyud kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /de yang phyug pa dang /nor mang ba dang /longs spyod che ba dang /yongasu gzung ba yangs shing rgyas par gyur nus bdag
143b3('dul ba): gi dbang phyug kyang nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /bdag cag shi zhing dus las 'das pa na/bdag cag gi phyir smyon pa dag sbyin zhing /bsod nams dag byas nas/'di de gnyis
143b4('dul ba): gang du skyes pa der/rje su 'gro bar gyur cig ces yon sngo bar byed par shog cig/de la sems can zhugaso par rig nas/de tshun chad chung ma la lhag par dga' bar gyur/
143b5('dul ba): bkur bsti che bar gyur byams par gyur nas/steng gi khang bzangs kyi thog tu gnod pa med par 'dug tu bcug ste/grang ba na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag
143b6('dul ba): dang /sman pas bstan pa'i kha zas dang /btung ba'i bye brag ha cang mi bsil ba/ha cang mi dro ba/ha cang mi kha ba/ha cang mi tsha ba/ha cang len tshwa mi che ba/ha cang mi sbyar ba/
143b7('dul ba): cang mi mngar ba/ha cang mi ska ba/ha cang mi snum pa/ha cang mi rtsub pa/kha ba dang /tsha ba dang /lan tshwa dang /skyur ba dang /mngar ba dang /bska ba dang /snum pa dang /rtsub pa rnam par
144a1('dul ba): spangs pa'i kha zlas dang /btung ba dag gis de la rim gro byed du 'jug go/de nas mngal na gnas pa yongasu bskyang ba'i phyir/'di ltar chung ma de dos tshon
144a2('dul ba): sna tshogasu spel ba ni bskon/lag pa ni gser gyi gdu bu dang /nor bu dang /mu tog las gau tams/do shal dang /se mo do rnam par 'phyong ba dang /zam pa dang /gdu bya dang /dpung
144a3('dul ba): rkyen dang /rnam gdug khor ni thogs/mig ni mig sman gyis bris/bzhin ni dmar gyi'i thog les mdzes par byas/so ni me tog ku lu ta do//dngul dang /kha ba dang /mu tog gi do sha
144a4('dul ba): dang /me tog kun+da dang /zla ba dang /ngang pa dang /ba'i 'o ma dang /dung dang /dAd ma'i rtsa ba ltar dri ma med pa/rgod pa ni gser gyi 'og pag gcig gis bcings rkang pa ni rkang rgyan gyis
144a5('dul ba): mdzes par byas nas/gser gyi mchod sdong me tog gis klubs pa lta bu de 'di ltar mngal du zhugs pa'i sems can gyis bsod nams byas pa dang /dge ba byas pa'i rgyus steng gi
144a6('dul ba): khang bzangs kyi thog na/'thun zhing rje su 'thun pa'i 'khor/gling bu dang /pe dad dang /rdza rnga dang /rnga bo che dang /rol mo'i sgra sbran pa 'byin pa rnams kyis lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na
144a7('dul ba): chub bzhin du khang bzangs na rtse bar byed cing /dga' bar byed cing /de khro bo che legs par btsugs pa'i steng na//dri nas khrir dang /khri'u nas khri'ur rgyu zhing shed kyis gzhir mi 'jab
144b1('dul ba): ya la 'ba' yang sgra yid du ni 'ong ba 'byon par mi byed du//khyimad yang nor dang /'bru dang /dbyig dang /gsor dang /mdzad dang /bang ba dang /bran dang /zan mo dang /las byed pa dang //
144b2('dul ba): sa 'tsho ba dang /rkeng gnyis pa dang /rgod bzhi pa lo sogs pa dag gisad+d+his shing ji ril por gyur te/ji ltar rgya mtsho chen po chu klung lnga brgya dag gis nyin gcig bzhin du khyim
144b3('dul ba): smras par gyur to//re zhig na gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa'i blon po lnga brgya rnams kyi chung ma la yang sems can zhugs par gyur to//de nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das
144b4('dul ba): tses pa ltas/khyeru gzugs pa rang gi/bstan drugag/sag+sa padi 'i'i'i mdo'i ltar dkar ba/mgo gdugs lnga gyi/lag tu ring ba/dan pa'i
144b5('dul ba): sbyi rmugs kyi rgyu tshad de/sna'i ga /ngan dru spong ni ste 9/dpung pa rang ba nig ses so/ zla chen thams
144b6('dul ba): 'i dzin pa lnga ban+d+ha'i bu thaMng bcas so//rgod ma sna ba rgyu yang rte'u 'dra so//de shin du rdzas skyes kyi 'i bar du yang rgyas par brjod par/de nyi du dag 'am shing lnga
144b7('dul ba): nas/nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu zhes bya ba nas/grong khyer du cis rten gyis te/zhes bya ba'i'aM dang /khye'u mo mo tshar gdags zhes bar dri brjod par byar/
145a1('dul ba): de dag las kha cig na re nor rnams dang lhan cig tu skyes la gyad kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa'i bu yang yin pas de'i phyir ming gyad bu nor du gdags so
145a2('dul ba): zhes zer ro//gzhan dag na re 'di nor dang 'dra bar skyes la/'di ba yang gyod kyi sna chen po la gtogs pa yin pas/khye'u gyi ming gyad bu nor zhes ming du gdagaso//zhes zer nas/
145a3('dul ba): ming gyad bu nor du gdags te zhes bya ba nas/ma ma brgyad la gtad do zhes bya ba'i bar dang /'o ma dang /zho dang /mar sar dang zhes bya ba nas/skyed par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//
145a4('dul ba): mngag zhugs ma bu mo zhig gis/de phrag pa la blangs te srang du zhugs pa dang /de na bram ze mtshan mkhan zhig gis mthong nas/'di skad ces smraso//rkang gnyis pa bsod nams
145a5('dul ba): kyi zhing yin no zhes bya ba nas/pha las blangs te zhes bya ba'i bar dang /til mar dri zhim pos byugs nas zhes bya ba nas mchod pa byas nas/phyir khyim du bskyal to zhes bya ba'i
145a6('dul ba): bar du'o//gang gis che chen por gyur pa de'i tshe/yi ge dang cis slob tu bcug go//zhes bya ba nas/rtsis dang gzhan dag la/de bro rno ba dang /byang bar gyur to//rgyal rigs rnams kyis bzor
145a7('dul ba): gnas dang /dmas kyi gnas gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/glang po che'i gnya' bar non pa dang /rtal bzhon pa dang /shing rta'i thabs dang /ral gri'i thabs dang /'bong thubs dang /phyir du
145b1('dul ba): ba dang /mdun du bskur ba dang /lcags smos bsgyur ba'i thabs dang /zhags pa gdab pa dang /rdo rje rtse cig pa 'phang ba dang /'khor lo 'phang ba'i thabs dang /mda' bo che 'phang ba'i thabs dang /
145b2('dul ba): 'dzin stangs dang /gos stangs dang /thor tshugs bcing ba dang /bcad pa dang /gdub pa dang /dbug pa dang /dral ba dang /gshegs pa dang /rgyang nas thog pa dang /sgra grag par phog pa dang /
145b3('dul ba): gnang du bsnun pa dang /mi 'chor bar phog bA gla tshabs cher phogs par bya ba la pha rol tu phyin par gyur to//gnas bzhi rnams dang /'phen pa lnga rnams dang /rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad po
145b4('dul ba): rnams la/mchog tu blo ba dang /byang bar gyur to//bas kyang de'i bskyed mos tshal gsum po dgun gyi dang /dpyid kyi dang /dbyar gyi rnams byed du bcug ste/dgun gyi ni gcig tu dro ba'o//
145b5('dul ba): dpyid kyi ni gcig tu bsil ba'o//dbyar gyi na he cang mi dro ha cang mi grong ba'o//chung ma'i 'khor gsum po chen mo dang /bar mo dang chun ma yad+mo bzhag go/de yang snying gi khang bzangs kyi
145b6('dul ba): thog na ne ldangs rnams dang lhan cig tu gling bu dang /pi bang dang /snga rnga dang /khar rnga dang /lcags kyi sil khor dang /rol mo'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa rnams kyis longs spyod byed de/dper
145b7('dul ba): na sems can bsod nams byas shing dge ba byas pa dag/rang gi bsod nams kyis 'bras bu nyam su myong bar byed pa bzhin no//de nas dus gzhan zhig na de'i grogs po rnams ri
146a1('dul ba): na /du ma gas bya nas rlos pa/rmugs pa dag gams das/de dag hU~M /rA ga nga //de kun par bshos byu nga /
146a2('dul ba): zhig/dri dag gis smras pa/dgon par song nas ri dgas dge bas dade/sha khyer te 'ongs nas shi dgos pa'i bye ba byed pa'o//des de rnams la smras pa/dgon pa na gnas shing rtsa zan
146a3('dul ba): 'thung ba de dag gis khyed cag la gnod pa ci zhig byas na gsod par byed/de dag gis smras pa/'di ltar kho bo cag la gnod pa/cung zad kyang mi byas mod kyi/'on kyang dga' ba'i slang du
146a4('dul ba): 'brums par bgyid do//de bas na smra bar mdzad cig dang lhan cig du po rnyed par 'gyur//des smras pa/'di ltar re zhig bdag khyed cag 'gro por 'dod pa yang med na/bdag 'gro
146a5('dul ba): lha rlom kyang ci dag pa te/spyod pa de ni bzang po ma yin no//de dag 'di snyam du gal te bdag gis ma khrid na bdag cag kyang 'gror mi ster ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'ang
146a6('dul ba): snyam du bsams nas nas byi ba'i bar du'o//de dag gyad bu nor gyi ba ma gA la~M ba der dong ste byin nas 'di skad ces smraso//ma ba yum dag gang gi spyir gnon nu gadrum pa rtsal che ba de
146a7('dul ba): ste bu 'og gi rgyal po rnamos kyis tho se nas/bag 'dzum par 'gyur ning zhes bya ba nasems kyi btsun mo yang 'i phel bar 'gyur re zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//dza tsam na de la du
146b1('dul ba): mas song la grogs po rnams kyis 'gro ba bzhin du gyis shig ces smras pa dang zhes bya ba nas legs zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//dang ma la gus pa yin pas des 'dra snyam du 'di ltar
146b2('dul ba): bdag gis de dag gi tshig bajug par mi nus te/'di ltar pha mas bsgru ba bzhin du bo dgos pas pha mas bsgo ba bzhin du 'gro bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/des khas blangs so//
146b3('dul ba): de nas phra mas kyang bu de 'gre ba'i bsam pa rtogs nas/bdag nyid kyi grong na gnas pa'i 'bangs dang /zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la byad bu nor ri dwags shor du 'gro yis khyed cag kyang
146b4('dul ba): song zhig ces bsgo'o//de dag kyang bsgo ba bzhin du 'ongs nas/nyi ma gnyis pa la gyad bu nor gyad kyi sna la gtogs pa'i bu lnga brgyas bskor te/zho shas 'tshe ba'i mi dang /bran g.yog
146b5('dul ba): mang pos yongs su bskor nas ri dgas shor du song ngo //de nas de la grogs po rnams kyis smras pa/grogs po khyod ci ridags skong du 'gro 'am/'on te 'phan kar sdod ces byas pa dang /
146b6('dul ba): des 'di snyam du gal te 'di 'phan dka ru bzhag ste/bdag gis ri rigs btab par 'gyur na de dag 'phreng snyen pas rnyi dwags phal po che bsad par 'gyur bas/bdag gis 'ban kar
146b7('dul ba): bsdad na rung ngo //snyam du bsams nas/des de dag lings la song zhig ces bsgo ba dang /de dag kyang yid po tu dka' bar gyur nas grogs po bdag cog de kho na ltar dad do//de dag gis
147a1('dul ba): 'di snyam du 'di ni gnas bzhi dang 'phang ba lnga rnams la byang ba yin pas phal mo che zhig bsad par 'gyur ro snyam du bsam so//de yang mda' stong gis bkang
147a2('dul ba): pa'i dong pa thogs nas 'phan kAr 'dug go//de dag gis kyang ri dgas phal mo che kun nas bskyongs pa dang /ri dgas de dag 'jigs skrag bzhin du gzhon nu'i drung du lhags
147a3('dul ba): pa dang /gzhon nu ni snying rje can gyis btabs par gyur pa de dag mthong nas yid mi bde bar gyur nas snying rjes mngon par gdungs par gyur te/de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa smras pa/sems
147a4('dul ba): can kun la sbyin pa byin pa dang //sems can gcig la snying brtse gang //sems can kun la sbyin pa 'byin pa ngas//snying brtse gcig tu khyad par 'phags//de dag rlung ltar 'gyu
147a5('dul ba): zhing gzhan gyis sdug bsngal bar byas pa/de dag dbyer bar gyur kyang mda' ma 'phang so//'di ltar sems can thams cad ni shes pa gcog po kun rdzob shes pa dang ldan pa yin
147a6('dul ba): pas/de dag gis 'dri snyam du bdag nyid chen po 'din snying rje can yin no snyam du bsams te/de dag de la legs par thugs kyang 'jigs pa med par bar ro//de nas gyad bu
147a7('dul ba): nor 'di snyam du gal te bdag gis mda' ma 'phangs pa grogs po 'ga' zhig gis thos na/yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams shing des yang 'di snyam du ma la de dag
147b1('dul ba): bdag la gshe bar 'gyur ba yongasu spang ba'i phyir dang /bdag sbyor ba la goms par shes par bya ba'i phyir mda' 'phang ngo snyam du bsams nas/des de ltar bsams te/'di ltar
147b2('dul ba): sems can 'ga' la yang gnod pa skyed par mi 'gyur bar mdo' 'phangaso//des kyang bslabs pas mdo' rnams rA srag dang rkang lag gi bar dang /spu gso ba dang /rna bar dag tu 'phang
147b3('dul ba): te btang ngo //des de ltar mda' stong po de dag sems can gcig la gnod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar 'phang so//de nas ri dgas de dag shin tu thal nas dong pa dang /de'i grogs po rnams
147b4('dul ba): 'ongs nas/phan kar 'dug ste/phan tshun du 'di snyam du dang bdag cag gos ri dgas phal mo che kun nas bskongs la gyad bu nor 'di yang gnas bzhi dang /'phangs pa rnam pa lnga la
147b5('dul ba): byang ba yin pas/de ring ri dgas mang po zhig bsad par 'gyur na/khur khal dag khyer te ma 'ongs pa ni gcig tu nye ba byas so snyam du bsam so//ji tsam drung du phyin na de dag gis/
147b6('dul ba): ro dwags gcig kyang ma bsad par mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang gyad bu nor de la 'di skad ces smraso//grogs po ri dgas de dag gar song /des 'di skad ces smras so//bros te
147b7('dul ba): song ngo //de dag gis smras pa/ci khyod kyis mda'i ma 'phangs sam/des smras pa/'phangs te dong pa stong par 'dug pa la ltos/de dag gis 'di snyam du 'di ltar gyad bu nor
148a1('dul ba): 'phang pa de lta bu dag la de ltar byung bar gyur to zhes bya ba de'i grags pa brdzun pa lta/rnam pa gcig kyang mi shes na/bzhi char shes pa lta smos kyang ci
148a2('dul ba): dgos snyam du bsams te zhes bya ba nas de'i grogs po rnams smod par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar dang /rang gi khyim du 'ongs nas stengs gi khang bzangs kyi thog na/log pa
148a3('dul ba): 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongasu chud do zhes bya ba'i bar nas/pha mo 'ongs nas 'di skad ces smras so zhes bya ba'i bar dang /bu ci'i phyir khyod kyis ri dgas ma bsad/des
148a4('dul ba): smras pa yab yum khyed cag la bdag sdug lags som bu shin tu sdug go/gal te 'ga' zhig gis bdag srog dang phral na khyed cag ji lta bur 'gyur de dag gis smras pa/shin
148a5('dul ba): tu sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde bar 'gyur mod/des smras pa/khyed cag la yang srog mi phangs lags sam/de dag gis smras pa/shin tu phangaso//'o na khyed cig ci'i slad
148a6('dul ba): du bdag gzhan gyi srog gcod pa la sbyor bar mdzad/gzhan yang yab yum khyed cag gis/'di ltar 'byung po rnams la phan 'dod snying brtse bas/srog gcod pa dang gsod dang
148a7('dul ba): 'ching ba spongs/ji ltar rang gi srog phangs srung ba ltar/de bzhin gzhan rnams kyi yang srog bsrung ngo //zhes bgyi ba ci ma bas na tam zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de nas de dag gis
148b1('dul ba): bude'i nges pa khong du chud nas 'di skad ces smras//bu de lta na phyir yang steng gi khang bzangs kyi thog tu/btsun ma'i 'khor rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis shig/de nas gyad bu nor gyis steng gi khangs
148b2('dul ba): bzangs kyi thog nas 'di skad ces rkang gnyis pa dang /rkang mingad dang /sman dang /rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang ba gang gis bdag 'khor ba'i dgon pa las yongasu thar par byed pa su yod
148b3('dul ba): ces spra so//de'i tshe yul ldog byung na ston pa drug po thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par thams cad mabyin par mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa rnams gnas te zhes bya ba na/'od srung gi gan du song
148b4('dul ba): ste/'di skad ces smras//khyed kyis chos kyi tshul ni gang yin/slob la gdams pa ni gang yin//khyod kyi tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i 'bras bu ni gang /pan yon ni gang yin/des smras pa/
148b5('dul ba): gzhon nu kho bo ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/sbyin pa med do//mchod sbyin med do//sbyin po sreg med do//legs par smad pa med do//nyes par spyad pa med do//legs par spyad pa dang /
148b6('dul ba): nyes par spyad pa rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam por smin pa med do//'jig rten 'di mod do//'jig rten pha rol med do//ma med do//pa med do//sems can rdzus te skye ba med do//
148b7('dul ba): 'jig rten 'di na yang dag par song ba dang /yang dag par zhugs pa'i dgra bcom pa gang dag rang gi mngon par shes pas 'jig rten 'di dang /'jig rten pha rol mngon sum du byas shing
149a1('dul ba): bsgrubs nas khong du chud par byas te/bdag gis skye ba zad do//tshangs par spyod pa bsten to//bya ba byaso//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar
149a2('dul ba): byed pa dag med do zhes bya ba nas/ston pa 'di yang lom gol bar zhugs pa/lam ngan pa sgrub par byed pa yin te/mkhas pa rnams kyis lam 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ji lta ba/
149a3('dul ba): bzhin du/spang bar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba'i bar dang /tshig su bcad pa smras pa/lha ngan log par ston byed pa/dman pa ston par grags pa ste/gang gis chos ni de 'dra ba/de yi
149a4('dul ba): chos min ci 'dra zhig/zhes bya ba nas de bzhin du ston pa drug po rnams snod stong pa bzhin du brdabs te song ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid
149a5('dul ba): ni ni lan gsum mtshan lan gsum/nyin mtshan lani drug tu sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten rnams la grong ni nyams par gyur/gang ni sdug bsngal bar gyur/gang ni nyam
149a6('dul ba): nga bar gyur/gang ni yid mi bde bar gyur/gang gi sdug bsngal ba dang nyam nga bar dang mi bde bar gyur/gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par bya//gang gi/
149a7('dul ba): bskyed pa rnams ni 'phel bar bya/gang gi dge ba'i rtse ba yongasu ma smin pa rnams ni yongasu smin par bya/gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu smin pa rnams shes rab kyi mtshon gyis dral
149b1('dul ba): bdag/gang ni sangs rgyas kyis 'dul/gang ni nyan thos kyis 'dul/gang ni sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyis 'dul/gang ni zhe sdang la spyod/gang ni 'dod chags la spyod/gang ni gti mug
149b2('dul ba): la spyod/gang ni 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti muka la spyod/gang ni nyes dmigs gang gis gnod par gyur/'phags pa'i nor dang bral ba gang ni 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug
149b3('dul ba): gi bdag po la rab tu bzhag par bya/nyes par spyod pa'i 'damo du bying ba gang gi lhag nas drang bar bya/gang ni ngan song las bslang ste mtho ris dang mthar pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu
149b4('dul ba): gzhag par bya zhes gzigs pa 'jug go//yang smras pa/rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyis gnas//dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi/gdul bya la byams sangs rgyas ni/dus las 'da'
149b5('dul ba): par mi 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sgrib pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis kun tu gzigs nas/dgongs pa gyad bu nor de/sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams
149b6('dul ba): la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/smon lam btab par gyur pa/'bras smin pa mtshan gyis rtol 'dod pa lta bur thugasu chud nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du gang gis 'dul bar
149b7('dul ba): 'gyur/ci nyan thos kyi 'dul lam/'on te sangs rgyas kyis 'dul/ci spyod lam gyis 'dul lam/'on te chos bshad pas 'dul snyam du dgongaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod lam
150a1('dul ba): gyis 'dul na/gang gi spyod lam gyis 'dul snyam du dgongs na zhes bya ba nas/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul yul sdig byung du phyin nas/yul sdig byung na srin
150a2('dul ba): bu pad+ma'i nags khrod na 'dug go/de nas tshe dang ljon pa rta thul snga dro sham thabs bgos zhes bya ba nas/gyad bu nor steng gi khangs bzangs kyis thog na 'dug pas/tshe dang ldan pa rta thul
150a3('dul ba): 'gro ba dang /log pa dang /bskum pa dang /brkyang ba dang /snam sbyar dang /chos gos dang /lhung bzed thogs pa mdzes pa de mthong ngo //gyad bu nor gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rta thul mthong ba de'i
150a4('dul ba): tshe/tshig su bcad pa smras pa/rtags can chos kyis 'tsho byed pa//'di na phal cher bdag gis mthong //zhi zhing zhi bar gnas gyur pa//'di 'dra bdag gis ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o///
150a5('dul ba): mi zhig btang nas zhes bya ba nas spyod lam ma mthong ste/slar log nas/gzhon nu la smraso zhes bya'i bar du'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul te/lta
150a6('dul ba): 'dod de zhes bya ba nas yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas nas 'dug ste/de la smras pa/ci khyod bston pa yin nam/'on te nyan thos yin/tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis
150a7('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas tshigasu bcad pa smras pa/ri dbang gangs can dang yungs kar nyid kyi khyad par gang yin dang //rgya mtsho dang ni phyugs rjes chu chung nyid kyi khyad par gang yin dang //nyi ma 'od zer
150b1('dul ba): dra ba che dang srin bu me khyer khyad gang yin//de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gtor dang nyan thos khyad par ra zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//ba ma gnyis kyi gan du 'ongs na/gsol ba 'debs
150b2('dul ba): par byed do zhes bya ba nas/ma gnang ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gang nyin zhag gcig zan bcad pa'i bar dang /pha ma 'ongs nas 'di skad ces smras pa/khyod kyis sdug bsngal mi shes te tshangs par
150b3('dul ba): spyo po spyad dka'o//cig pu nyid la mngon par bya dka'o//kyi nas mal dgon pa dang /nags 'dabs dang /bas mtha' dag tu gnas par bya dka'o//khyod kyis ji srid 'tshe'i bar gcan zan
150b4('dul ba): gogadug po dag dang lhan cig gnas par bya dag so//khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi rnams kyi dga' ba dang /rtsed mo dag las mngon par dben par bya dgos so//bu khyod tshur shog 'dug
150b5('dul ba): la sbyin pa dag byin cig/'dod pa la yong yongasu spyod cig ces bya ba'i bar du'o//rje su gnang nas zhes bya ba nas/lus kyi stobs dang /mthu yang dag par bskyed nas zhes bya ba'i bar
150b6('dul ba): dang /phas gyad bu nor rab tu 'byung bar 'dod kyis gang dag rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de dag kyang deng shig/ces dril bsgrags par bya ba'i bar du'o//de nas de'i ne'u ljongs gang
150b7('dul ba): yin pa de dag 'di snyam du gyad bu nor 'di ni bde bar 'dod pa shin tu gzhan pa yin yang /khyim gyi bde ba spangs nas/nges par byung ste rab tu byung bar byed na/bdag cag gis rje
151a1('dul ba): ltar bya snyam du bsams pa las/de las gcig gis 'di skad ces legasu zad de/bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes smraso//de nas gyod du
151a2('dul ba): nor gzhon nu lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gang na ba der song te phyin nas/rta thul gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang
151a3('dul ba): bu nor gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la 'di skad ces smra so//btsun pas bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la ra tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos
151a4('dul ba): po thob par mdzad du gsol//bdag khyod kyi thad du tshangs par spyad par spyod do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/khyud bu nor rim gyis rab tu phyung ste/bsnyen par rdzogs par byaso//
151a5('dul ba): des kyang sde snod gsum po dag kha ton du bton cing bsgoms pos dgra bcom par gyur te/khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/bang ba dang gser du mnyam pa/nam mkha'
151a6('dul ba): dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ste'u dang can dan du mnyam pa/mi rigs pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral ba/rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob
151a7('dul ba): pa/srid pa dang 'dod pa'i snyed pa dang /bkur sti la brgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa bya ba dang /rjed par bya ba dang /mngon du smra bar bya bar
151b1('dul ba): gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi lugs 'di ltar 'dus pa chen po gnyis yod de dbyar zla 'bring po la dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa'i tshe dang /ston zla 'bring po nya la'o//gang dag dbyar zla
151b2('dul ba): 'bring po la dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa'i tshe/gdams ngag dang /rdzi mu bstan pa mnos pa de dag grong dang grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pha brang dag tu dbyar gnas par byas po de
151b3('dul ba): dge ston zla 'bring po'i nya lo 'ongs nas ji ltar khong du chud pa dag ni rjod par byed/gong mar gyur pa dag ni 'dri bar byed do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du nyan
151b4('dul ba): thos chen po rnams kyi yang de lta bu yin pas/tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyi lhan cig gnas pa dang /nye gnas gang dag grong dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang du dbyar
151b5('dul ba): gnas par byas pa de dang /de dag ston zla 'bring po nya la tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gang na ba der lhags pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis mthong ngo //tshangs par spyod pa de dag mthong nas kyang
151b6('dul ba): bas ste gsong por smra bas yang dag par dga' bar byas te/chos gos dang /khar bsil dang /ril pa spyi lugs dang /gtur bu dang /zhwa dang /mchil lham dang /gding ba dag blangs so//
151b7('dul ba): dedag kyang mkhan po'i drung du song nas/bsnyen bkur byas te/ji ltar khong du chud pa ni rjod par byed/gong mor gyur pa ni 'dri bar byed cing /rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der bcom ldan 'das
152a1('dul ba): la brAlta ba dang /bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/'gro bar byed pa dag gyad bu nor gyis mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang slob dpon gcig
152a2('dul ba): pa dang /mkhan po gcig pa de dag gi drung du song nas 'di skad ces smraso//khyod cag gang du dang /de dag gis smras pa/bdag cag gis mkhan po ni mthong zin pas da ni sangs
152a3('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ltar 'gro'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyis 'di snyam du/bdag gis mkhan po dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pas/bcom ldan 'das//
152a4('dul ba): kyi chos kyi sku ni mthong na/gzugs kyi sgyu ma mthong bas/bdag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der 'gro'o snyam du bsam so//de ltar bsams nas kyang /gyad bu nor gyis mkhan po la/
152a5('dul ba): 'di skad smras so//mkhan po bdag gis mkhan po dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku ni mthong na/gzugs kyi sku ni ma mthong bas//
152a6('dul ba): deni gzugs kyi sku lta bar 'tsha lo//de skad ces smras pa dang /rta thul gyis gyad bu nor la 'di skad ces smra so//bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
152a7('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnams ni/dper na u dum ba ra'i me tog ltar shin tu mthong bar dka' ba yin pas/bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la
152b1('dul ba): lta bar gyis shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor mkhan pos rjesu gnang bas/ne'u ldangs mkhan po gcig pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo //de'i tshen
152b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma la chos ston te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gyang bu nor chung ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigaso//gzigs nas kyang gyad du nor la bka' stsal pa/
152b3('dul ba): gyad bu ni re tshur shog/'ongs pa legs khyod dus su phyin to zhes bkye' stsal to//de'i tshe na gnas mal mi mthun par 'bog par byed do//mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams dang /'dul ba 'dzin pa nas
152b4('dul ba): su lhan cig mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams dang /mo mo 'dzin pa rnamasu lhan cig/'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams dang /mdo sde 'dzin pa rnamasu lhan cig/'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams dang /ma mo 'dzin pa
152b5('dul ba): rnamasu lhan cig ces bya ba nas/de bzhin du mu gsum la yang sbyang bar bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du/gyad bu nor 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kye ma'o//bcom ldan
